content:
Use the 'playwright' MCP to:
1. Navigate to http://106.37.170.238:8232/
2. Take a snapshot and save it to /home/aiscend/work/home_snapshot.md (use browser_snapshot tool)
3. Get console messages (use browser_console_messages tool)
4. Write a brief analysis of the page content and any errors found in the console to /home/aiscend/work/vibelife/docs/components/frontend/home_analysis.md.

Ensure you use the correct tool names: browser_navigate, browser_snapshot, browser_console_messages.
